snippet: Theatergoers attending the West End production of “Billy Elliott the Musical” voted at Monday’s performance to retain the song “Merry Christmas Maggie Thatcher,” whose lyrics refer to celebrating her death.
abstract: Theatergoers attending the West End production of “Billy Elliott the Musical” voted at Monday’s performance to retain the song “Merry Christmas Maggie Thatcher,” whose lyrics refer to celebrating her death.

headline.main: After an Audience Vote, 'Billy Elliot' Musical Keeps an Anti-Thatcher Song
